Class DataJpaAbsenceRepositoryImpl

  • java.lang.Object

    AbsenceRepository, TypicalRepository<Absence>

public class DataJpaAbsenceRepositoryImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements AbsenceRepository

      • save

        public Absence save​(Absence absence)
        Saves or updates a given absence. Returns null if there aren't updating value in the data base.
        Specified by:
        save in interface TypicalRepository<Absence>
        Parameters:
        absence - an absence to save.
        Returns:

      • save

        public Absence save​(Absence absence,
                    int empId,
                    int absenceReasonId)
        Saves or updates a given object with inserted parameters.
        Specified by:
        save in interface AbsenceRepository
        Parameters:
        absence - the object to save or update with inserted parameters.
        empId - the employee's id, the employee will be inserted to the saved object's employee field.
        absenceReasonId - absence reason's id, the absence reason will be inserted to the saved object's absenceReason field.
        Returns:
        a saved or update object, null - if there aren't updated object in the data base.

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<Absence> getAll()
        Returns all absences sorted with specified sort. List is sorted by employee's last name, first name, second name and absence's start date.
        Specified by:
